participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, Jessica enjoys connecting with others over shared interests. She has a playful side and loves exploring new worlds, whether in games or literature.
participant_1.background: I had to call 911 when I had a terrible headache. I never learned how to write. I used to own 6 cats. I can only see 200 feet in front of me. I got married to my high school friend.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Mark often reflects on his past and current choices. He has a dry sense of humor and tries to project a cultured image.
participant_2.background: I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice. I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured. I had one stepdad, and fortunately, he ignored me. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and read.
Oh, me too! What kind of video games do you play?
I like to play RPGs and puzzle games.
Nice! I like those too. I'm playing a lot of Elder Scrolls Online right now.
Oh, I've never played that one. Is it good?
Yeah, it's really good! It's a big open world game with a lot of things to do.
That sounds cool! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's free to play, so you don't have anything to lose.
Okay, I'll check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what's your favorite kind of books?
I like all kinds of books, but I especially like fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I love getting lost in a different world.
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series. Is it good?
It's really good! It's a long series, but it's worth the read.
Okay, I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great series.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a programmer.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to learn how to program.
It's not that hard! There are a lot of great resources online.
Okay, I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's a great skill to have.
